participant_1.background:
I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts.
i work at a power plant.
I wake up early to make breakfast for my brother before he leaves for the army.
i am thinking of becoming a mother next year.
I'm a person who can enjoy the simple things in life and also be prepared for whatever comes my way.

participant_2.background:
I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes.
i work in a coffee shop.
i am a lawyer.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.
i like the taste of cheese.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I'm a bit tired because I had to wake up early to make breakfast for my brother, but other than that, I'm good.
Aw, that's nice of you! My brother is in the army, so I don't get to see him very often.
I'm sorry to hear that! I'm sure you miss him a lot.
Yeah, I do. But I'm glad he's doing what he loves.
Me too! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a lawyer. What about you?
Oh, cool! I work at a power plant.
That sounds interesting!
Yeah, it is. It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking and camping. I also like to read and cook.
Those all sound like fun activities! I like to read and cook too.
Great! Do you have any favorite books or recipes?
I love the Harry Potter series and I love to cook Italian food.
Me too! I love Harry Potter! I've read the series multiple times.
That's awesome! I've read them all at least three times.
Great! So, what do you think of the new Fantastic Beasts movie?
I loved it! I thought it was really good.
Me too! I thought it was a great addition to the Harry Potter universe.
Yeah, it was. I'm excited to see what happens in the next one.
Me too! I think it's going to be great.
